summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 5685 for the improvement of 24th Avenue West, from West Smith Street to West Armour Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 75224 as amended by Ordinance No. 75350, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
